title: is the My Shop Bugged or does riot just not like me?
body: So my SALE items are on sale but not reduced by the actual prices, is this just a problem i'm having or is this a bug that is happening to a lot of people?

replies.body:
It's important to note that the prices shown include the champion if unowned (this should show up at the bottom of the "My Shop" tab).

Helpful screenshot:
https://imgur.com/a/oZAYhch
